MajorClaims.MC1: it still has its bad side, especially for children

Claims.C1: it is undeniable that computer is a crucial part of human life
Claims.C2: using computer constantly has bad influence on children's eyes
Claims.C3: people who are addicted to games, especially online games, can eventually bear dangerous consequences
Claims.C4: even people who are not interested in online game can still be negatively affected by using computer too much

Premises.P1: When they concentrate on computer for too long, their eyes will get tired, which is the main reason for some eyes problems, typically shortsighted
Premises.P2: children who play games too much on computer can seriously lack communicating skills
Premises.P3: several teenagers play games without rest, which leads to health depression
Premises.P4: a typical example is the death of Korean gamer, who had a non-stop playing for 3 days
Premises.P5: Some social surveys have shown that a few children use computer for studying purpose, most of them are attracted by facebook, blog, etc. instead
Premises.P6: they will have a bad result in school
Premises.P7: when they can not live without internet, they will have no time for their studying
Premises.P8: they will know little about the outside life
